title: [RED] Test lifecycle state management
description: Write failing tests for lifecycle states. Test cases: 1) Document lifecycle stages (draft, review, approved, obsoleted), 2) Get current state, 3) List available states, 4) State type hierarchy.

title: Authentication & Session Management
description: Implement Veeva Vault authentication endpoints including session management, OAuth 2.0, SAML SSO, and Bearer token authentication. Sessions must support configurable timeout and the authorization header pattern.

title: [REFACTOR] Add object field type system
description: Extract field type handling into FieldTypeSystem. Support all Vault field types with SQLite mappings. Add custom field type registration for extensibility.

title: [RED] Test entry actions execution
description: Write failing tests for entry actions. Test cases: 1) Auto-start workflow on state entry, 2) Send notification emails, 3) Update field values, 4) Create related records, 5) Skip actions on workflow cancel.

title: [REFACTOR] Optimize recursive CTE for binder depth queries
description: Optimize binder hierarchy CTE queries. Add materialized path column for O(1) depth lookups. Implement lazy loading for deep hierarchies. Cache frequently accessed binder trees.

title: [RED] Test audit trail completeness
description: Write failing tests for audit trails. Test cases: 1) Log all field changes, 2) Log document access/download, 3) Log state transitions, 4) User identification, 5) Timestamp accuracy, 6) Cannot modify audit entries.

title: [RED] Test document delete endpoint
description: Write failing tests for DELETE /api/{version}/objects/documents/{id}. Test cases: 1) Soft delete (move to Deleted state), 2) Hard delete with force param, 3) Cannot delete if in workflow, 4) Audit trail created.

title: [GREEN] Implement automatic PDF generation
description: Implement automatic PDF rendition generation. Use document-to-PDF conversion (or external service). Apply watermarks based on lifecycle state (DRAFT, CONTROLLED COPY). Queue generation on document upload/version change.

title: [REFACTOR] Add workflow notification dispatcher
description: Extract notification sending into NotificationDispatcher. Support email, in-app, and webhook notifications. Add notification templates with variable substitution.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract binder hierarchy engine
description: Refactor binder operations into BinderHierarchyEngine. Abstract recursive tree operations. Optimize depth queries with materialized path or nested sets. Enable efficient bulk operations on binder contents.

title: [GREEN] Implement entry criteria validation
description: Implement entry criteria for state transitions. Support field conditions, relationship checks, and custom validators. Return detailed error messages on criteria failure. Cache compiled criteria for performance.

title: [RED] Test electronic signatures (21 CFR Part 11)
description: Write failing tests for e-signatures. Test cases: 1) Signature manifestation (name, meaning, date), 2) Re-authentication required, 3) Signature binding to document version, 4) Tamper-evident audit trail.

title: [RED] Test VQL pagination and performance
description: Write failing tests for VQL pagination. Test cases: 1) Default limit, 2) next_page in response, 3) pagesize/pageoffset params, 4) Query timeout handling, 5) Efficient query plans.

title: [RED] Test binder create endpoint
description: Write failing tests for POST /api/{version}/objects/binders. Test cases: 1) Create empty binder with metadata, 2) Create from template with sections, 3) Set binder lifecycle, 4) Validation of binder-specific fields.

title: [GREEN] Implement object workflow automation
description: Implement object workflow automation. Hook into record lifecycle events (AFTER_INSERT, field changes). Trigger workflows or state changes based on configured conditions. Enforce single-workflow constraint per record.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract session store abstraction
description: Refactor session management to use abstract SessionStore interface. Allow SQLite (default) and in-memory implementations. Prepare for distributed session management across DO instances.

title: [REFACTOR] Add object lifecycle state machine
description: Implement object-specific lifecycle state machine. Share code with document lifecycle. Support object type-specific state definitions.

title: [REFACTOR] Consolidate workflow state machine transitions
description: Refactor workflow states into formal state machine. Add transition guards, side effects, and rollback support. Enable workflow definition via configuration.

title: Documents API
description: Implement Veeva Vault Documents REST API including CRUD operations, versioning, metadata management, and file uploads. Endpoints: GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /api/{version}/objects/documents/{id}. Support pagination (max 200 per page), Library views, and keyword search.

title: [GREEN] Implement document file download
description: Implement GET /api/{version}/objects/documents/{id}/versions/{major}/{minor}/file. Stream file from R2 storage. Set proper Content-Type and Content-Disposition headers. Support Range header for resumable downloads.

title: [GREEN] Implement document delete endpoint
description: Implement DELETE /api/{version}/objects/documents/{id}. Default soft delete (lifecycle to Deleted). Support force=true for permanent. Check workflow state before delete. Record audit trail entry.

title: [GREEN] Implement workflow state transitions
description: Implement state transition logic. Validate entry criteria before transition. Execute entry actions (auto-start workflows, send notifications). Support workflow cancel with configurable cancel state.

title: [RED] Test workflow state transitions
description: Write failing tests for state changes. Test cases: 1) Change State action, 2) Entry criteria validation, 3) Entry actions execute on transition, 4) Workflow cancel returns to start state, 5) State change triggers notifications.

title: [GREEN] Implement binder section management
description: Implement section CRUD operations on binders. Endpoints for adding/removing sections, reordering (order_number field), and document-section bindings. Maintain referential integrity in binder_nodes table.

title: [GREEN] Implement lifecycle state management
description: Implement lifecycle state storage and retrieval. Store lifecycle definitions in SQLite. Support state types (Draft, InReview, Approved, Obsolete). Track document current state with history.

title: [GREEN] Implement object metadata retrieval
description: Implement metadata introspection endpoints. Return object definitions with fields, types, constraints, picklist values, and relationships. Cache metadata for performance. Support MDL-compatible format.

title: [GREEN] Implement VQL parser basics
description: Implement VQL parser using grammar. Parse SELECT, FROM, WHERE, FIND, ORDER BY, LIMIT. Build AST representation. Handle Vault-specific syntax like field__v naming and FIND for full-text search.

title: [RED] Test document file download
description: Write failing tests for GET /api/{version}/objects/documents/{id}/versions/{major}/{minor}/file. Test cases: 1) Stream file content, 2) Content-Type header matches, 3) Content-Disposition filename, 4) Range requests for partial download.

title: [GREEN] Implement rendition replace
description: Implement PUT /api/{version}/objects/documents/{id}/versions/{major}/{minor}/renditions/{type}. Replace existing rendition file. Archive old version. Maintain audit trail of rendition changes.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract workflow engine abstraction
description: Refactor workflow system into WorkflowEngine with pluggable steps. Abstract task assignment, state machine, and notification dispatch. Enable custom step types (review, approval, conditional routing).

title: [GREEN] Implement binder node relationships
description: Implement binder_nodes__sysr relationship for VQL queries. Support down relationships to child nodes, up relationships to parent binders. Enable document-in-binder queries and binder-contains-document queries.

title: [REFACTOR] Add entry criteria expression evaluator
description: Extract criteria evaluation into CriteriaEvaluator. Support field comparisons, relationship checks, and custom functions. Compile expressions for fast evaluation.

title: [RED] Test binder section management
description: Write failing tests for section operations. Test cases: 1) Add section to binder, 2) Remove section, 3) Reorder sections, 4) Add document to section, 5) Move document between sections.

title: [GREEN] Implement document update endpoint
description: Implement PUT /api/{version}/objects/documents/{id}. Support metadata-only updates and file version uploads. Auto-increment version (minor by default, major on lifecycle transition). Store version history.

title: [RED] Test binder node relationships
description: Write failing tests for binder_nodes__sysr VQL queries. Test cases: 1) Query binders containing specific document, 2) Query documents in specific binder, 3) Parent-child relationships, 4) Cross-binder document references.

title: [RED] Test object record CRUD
description: Write failing tests for object record operations. Test cases: 1) Create record POST /api/{version}/objects/{object_name}, 2) Retrieve record by ID, 3) Update record fields, 4) Delete record, 5) Field validation.

title: [RED] Test VQL binder queries
description: Write failing tests for binder VQL. Test cases: 1) Query binders object, 2) binder_nodes__sysr relationship, 3) Find documents in binder, 4) Find binders containing document, 5) Nested binder queries.

title: [RED] Test object lifecycle management
description: Write failing tests for object lifecycles. Test cases: 1) Object has lifecycle states, 2) state__v field on records, 3) Available user actions per state, 4) State transitions via API.

title: [RED] Test automatic PDF generation
description: Write failing tests for auto PDF generation. Test cases: 1) PDF created on document upload, 2) Watermark applied based on state, 3) PDF matches latest document version, 4) Generation triggered on version change.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract compliance engine
description: Refactor GxP compliance into ComplianceEngine. Abstract e-signature, audit trail, and validation into reusable module. Support IQ/OQ validation packages. Enable compliance reporting and data export.

title: [REFACTOR] Consolidate binder-document relationship queries
description: Create BinderRelationshipService for bidirectional queries. Optimize join queries for document-in-binder and binder-contains-document. Add query result caching.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract document storage layer
description: Refactor document storage into DocumentStore abstraction. Separate SQLite metadata operations from R2 file storage. Implement tiered storage strategy: hot (SQLite), warm (R2), cold (archive). Enable content-addressable storage for deduplication.

title: [RED] Test object metadata retrieval
description: Write failing tests for object schema. Test cases: 1) GET /api/{version}/metadata/objectTypes lists objects, 2) Retrieve object field definitions, 3) Field types, picklist values, 4) Relationship fields.

title: [GREEN] Implement workflow start on document
description: Implement workflow initiation for documents. Endpoint to list available lifecycle actions (workflow, stateChange, controlledCopy). POST to start workflow creates workflow instance, initial task, and state transition.

title: VQL Query API
description: Implement Vault Query Language (VQL) parser and execution engine. POST /api/{version}/query endpoint. Support SELECT, FROM, WHERE, JOINS, subqueries for documents/binders/objects. Return JSON with pagination. VQL is a SQL-like language specific to Vault.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract VQL AST optimizer
description: Add AST optimization pass to VQL transpiler. Implement predicate pushdown, join reordering, and subquery flattening. Cache optimized query plans.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract rendition pipeline
description: Refactor rendition handling into RenditionPipeline. Abstract conversion, watermarking, and storage. Enable pluggable converters for different file types. Support async generation with progress tracking.

title: [REFACTOR] Add binder template inheritance system
description: Refactor binder creation to support template inheritance. Enable template versioning and delta updates. Cache compiled templates for fast instantiation.

title: [GREEN] Implement document list endpoint
description: Implement GET /api/{version}/objects/documents with pagination (max 200), keyword search, Library view filtering. Return documents array with responseDetails including total count and next_page URL.

title: [REFACTOR] Add VQL query plan explainer
description: Implement EXPLAIN support for VQL queries. Show query plan in Vault-compatible format. Add query statistics and timing information.

title: [RED] Test document update endpoint
description: Write failing tests for PUT /api/{version}/objects/documents/{id}. Test cases: 1) Update metadata fields, 2) Upload new version with file, 3) Minor vs major version increment, 4) Validation of required fields.

title: Objects API
description: Implement Veeva Vault Objects REST API for custom object CRUD operations. Endpoints: GET/POST/PUT/DELETE /api/{version}/objects/{object_name}/{record_id}. Support batch operations (up to 500 records), metadata retrieval, and object lifecycle management.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract file streaming utilities for downloads
description: Create reusable FileStreamer utility for R2-to-response streaming. Consolidate Range header handling. Add progress tracking for large file downloads.

title: Renditions API
description: Implement document renditions management. Endpoints: GET/POST/PUT /api/{version}/objects/documents/{id}/versions/{major}/{minor}/renditions/{type}. Support PDF generation, watermarks, viewable renditions. Automatic rendition creation on document upload.

title: [GREEN] Implement VQL document queries
description: Implement VQL execution for documents. Translate VQL to SQLite queries. Handle document-specific fields (versions, lifecycle, binder). Support attachments__sysr subqueries.

title: [GREEN] Implement audit trail completeness
description: Implement complete GxP audit trail. Log all changes to append-only table. Include user, action, timestamp, old/new values. Support audit trail queries. Prevent modification of historical entries.

title: [RED] Test document retrieve endpoint
description: Write failing tests for GET /api/{version}/objects/documents/{id}. Test cases: 1) Return document metadata, 2) Include versions array, 3) Include binder__v field, 4) Return 404 for non-existent, 5) Respect version query param.

title: [RED] Test rendition upload
description: Write failing tests for rendition upload. Test cases: 1) POST rendition to specific version, 2) Supported types (viewable_rendition, pdf_rendition), 3) File size limits, 4) Rendition metadata.

title: [GREEN] Implement rendition download
description: Implement GET /api/{version}/objects/documents/{id}/versions/{major}/{minor}/renditions/{type}. Stream from R2 storage. Set proper content headers. Support version-specific and latest rendition retrieval.

title: [REFACTOR] Add rendition format converter registry
description: Create ConverterRegistry for rendition format handling. Register converters for PDF, viewable, and custom types. Support async conversion with progress tracking.

title: [REFACTOR] Add workflow escalation scheduler
description: Extract escalation logic into EscalationScheduler. Support configurable escalation rules, reminder notifications, and automatic reassignment. Use Durable Object alarms for scheduling.

title: [GREEN] Implement document create endpoint
description: Implement POST /api/{version}/objects/documents. Accept multipart form with file and metadata. Store document in SQLite (metadata) and R2 (file). Generate document ID, create initial version (0.1). Set lifecycle state to draft.

title: [RED] Test workflow task operations
description: Write failing tests for task management. Test cases: 1) List tasks assigned to user, 2) Complete task with decision, 3) Reassign task, 4) Task escalation on timeout, 5) Parallel task completion.

title: [RED] Test VQL document queries
description: Write failing tests for document VQL. Test cases: 1) SELECT on documents, 2) binder__v filtering, 3) lifecycle_state__v conditions, 4) Document version queries, 5) Attachment subqueries.

title: [RED] Test document create endpoint
description: Write failing tests for POST /api/{version}/objects/documents. Test cases: 1) Create with file upload and metadata, 2) Create with name__v, type__v, lifecycle__v, 3) Token-based chunked upload, 4) Validation errors return proper response.

title: [RED] Test document list endpoint
description: Write failing tests for GET /api/{version}/objects/documents. Test cases: 1) Return max 200 per page, 2) Support limit query param, 3) Support keyword search, 4) Support Library view filter, 5) Pagination with next_page link.

title: [GREEN] Implement session validation middleware
description: Implement Hono middleware to validate Authorization header session_id on all API endpoints. Update session last_active timestamp on valid requests. Return 401 with proper error response on invalid/expired sessions.

title: [GREEN] Implement workflow task operations
description: Implement task management endpoints. GET user tasks, PUT task completion with verdict, POST task reassignment. Track task status, due dates, and escalation triggers in SQLite.

title: [GREEN] Implement electronic signatures (21 CFR Part 11)
description: Implement FDA Part 11 compliant e-signatures. Capture signer identity, meaning, and timestamp. Require re-authentication before signing. Cryptographically bind signature to document hash. Immutable audit trail.

title: [REFACTOR] Consolidate e-signature cryptographic operations
description: Extract signature operations into SignatureManager. Centralize hash computation, signature binding, and verification. Support signature algorithm upgrades.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract entry action executor framework
description: Create ActionExecutor with pluggable action types. Add action retry logic and failure handling. Support async action execution with completion tracking.

title: [RED] Test object batch operations
description: Write failing tests for batch record operations. Test cases: 1) POST /api/{version}/objects/{object_name}/batchcreate up to 500 records, 2) Batch update, 3) Partial success handling, 4) Transaction rollback on failure.

title: [RED] Test entry criteria validation
description: Write failing tests for entry criteria. Test cases: 1) Field value requirements, 2) Required relationships, 3) Document completeness checks, 4) Custom validation rules, 5) Criteria failure messages.

title: Veeva Vault API Compatibility
description: Complete implementation of Veeva Vault REST API compatibility layer on Cloudflare Durable Objects. Implements Documents, Binders, Workflows, Objects, VQL Queries, Lifecycles, and Renditions APIs for life sciences content management.

title: [RED] Test VQL parser basics
description: Write failing tests for VQL parsing. Test cases: 1) SELECT fields FROM object, 2) WHERE clause conditions, 3) AND/OR operators, 4) FIND keyword search, 5) ORDER BY, LIMIT. VQL is SQL-like but Vault-specific.

title: [RED] Test VQL rendition queries
description: Write failing tests for rendition VQL. Test cases: 1) Query renditions object, 2) Filter by rendition type, 3) Version-specific renditions, 4) Rendition properties (size, format).

title: [GREEN] Implement binder retrieve with depth
description: Implement GET /api/{version}/objects/binders/{id} with depth query param. Use recursive CTE in SQLite to fetch binder hierarchy. Return sections, documents, and nested binders in tree structure.

title: [GREEN] Implement rendition upload
description: Implement POST /api/{version}/objects/documents/{id}/versions/{major}/{minor}/renditions/{type}. Store rendition file in R2. Record metadata in SQLite. Support viewable and PDF rendition types.

title: [REFACTOR] Consolidate object permission checks
description: Extract permission checking into PermissionService. Support object-level, field-level, and record-level permissions. Cache permission computations per session.

title: [REFACTOR] Consolidate VQL relationship traversal
description: Extract relationship traversal into RelationshipResolver. Handle both down (children) and up (parent) relationships. Optimize multi-hop relationship queries.

title: [GREEN] Implement authentication login endpoint
description: Implement POST /api/{version}/auth to pass all RED tests. Return session_id, list of vaults user can access. Store sessions in SQLite with configurable timeout (default 30min inactive, 48h max).

title: [RED] Test workflow start on document
description: Write failing tests for initiating workflow. Test cases: 1) Start workflow via lifecycle action, 2) List available workflows for document, 3) Start requires entry criteria met, 4) Workflow creates task assignments.

title: [RED] Test rendition download
description: Write failing tests for rendition download. Test cases: 1) GET rendition file, 2) Content-Type matches format, 3) Specific version rendition, 4) Latest version default, 5) 404 for missing rendition.

title: [RED] Test binder retrieve with depth
description: Write failing tests for GET /api/{version}/objects/binders/{id}. Test cases: 1) depth=all returns full hierarchy, 2) depth=0 returns binder only, 3) Sections include document references, 4) Nested binders are included.

title: [REFACTOR] Add audit trail query optimizer
description: Optimize audit trail queries with proper indexing. Add time-range partitioning for large audit logs. Implement audit summary views for reporting.

title: [GREEN] Implement object batch operations
description: Implement batch CRUD for up to 500 records per request. Use SQLite transactions. Return array with success/failure per record. Support partial success mode with individual error messages.

title: [REFACTOR] Optimize batch operations with bulk SQL
description: Refactor batch operations to use bulk INSERT/UPDATE statements. Implement chunked processing for 500+ records. Add progress reporting for long-running batches.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract VQL-to-SQL transpiler
description: Refactor VQL into standalone transpiler module. Abstract VQL AST to SQLite SQL generation. Enable query optimization, prepared statement caching, and custom function registration.

title: [GREEN] Implement object record CRUD
description: Implement object record CRUD endpoints. Store records in dynamic SQLite tables per object type. Validate fields against object metadata. Return record with ID, timestamps, and all field values.

title: [RED] Test rendition replace
description: Write failing tests for rendition replacement. Test cases: 1) PUT replaces existing rendition, 2) Old rendition archived, 3) Audit trail for replacement, 4) Version binding preserved.

title: Binders API
description: Implement Veeva Vault Binders REST API for hierarchical document organization. Endpoints: /api/{version}/objects/binders/{id}. Support binder sections, templates, depth queries, and binder_nodes__sysr relationships. Note: As of v5.0, binders require dedicated API (not documents API).

title: [GREEN] Implement VQL pagination and performance
description: Implement VQL pagination. Return responseDetails with total_count, has_more_results, next_page URL. Use cursor-based pagination for efficiency. Add query execution timeout.

title: [RED] Test object workflow automation
description: Write failing tests for object workflows. Test cases: 1) Auto-start workflow on record creation, 2) Field-triggered state change, 3) Workflow-specific lifecycle per object type, 4) Object record in only one workflow at a time.

title: Workflows API
description: Implement Veeva Vault Workflows API for document and object workflows. Support workflow lifecycle actions: Start Workflow, Change State, Controlled Copy. Include task assignment, notifications, and state transitions with entry criteria validation.

title: Lifecycle API
description: Implement document and object lifecycle state management. Support state transitions, entry criteria, entry actions, user actions, and triggers. GxP compliance with full audit trail for 21 CFR Part 11. Lifecycle states: draft, review, approved, obsoleted.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract object schema engine
description: Refactor object management into ObjectSchemaEngine. Support dynamic table creation from MDL, field type mapping to SQLite, and relationship management. Enable object type versioning and migration.

title: [GREEN] Implement VQL rendition queries
description: Implement VQL for renditions object. Support rendition type filtering, version association queries. Return rendition metadata including file properties.

title: [GREEN] Implement VQL binder queries
description: Implement VQL for binders and binder_node__sys. Support relationship traversal (binder_nodes__sysr down, parent up). Generate efficient SQLite joins for binder-document queries.

title: [RED] Test authentication login endpoint
description: Write failing tests for POST /api/{version}/auth endpoint. Test cases: 1) Valid username/password returns session_id and vault list, 2) Invalid credentials return 401, 3) Session timeout behavior, 4) Authorization header validation.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract lifecycle state graph builder
description: Create LifecycleGraphBuilder to parse lifecycle definitions. Build state graph with transitions, criteria, and actions. Enable lifecycle visualization and validation.

title: [RED] Test session validation middleware
description: Write failing tests for Authorization header middleware. Test cases: 1) Valid session_id passes through, 2) Expired session returns 401, 3) Missing header returns 401, 4) Session refresh on activity.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract workflow task assignment engine
description: Refactor task assignment into TaskAssignmentEngine. Support role-based, user-based, and round-robin assignment. Add task load balancing across users.

title: [GREEN] Implement binder create endpoint
description: Implement POST /api/{version}/objects/binders. Create binder with binder__v=true. Support template-based creation that copies section structure. Store binder hierarchy in SQLite with recursive structure.

title: [GREEN] Implement document retrieve endpoint
description: Implement GET /api/{version}/objects/documents/{id}. Return JSON with document metadata, versions array, lifecycle state, binder__v indicator. Support ?version= query param for specific versions.

title: [GREEN] Implement object lifecycle management
description: Implement object lifecycle support. Each object type can have a lifecycle with states. Records have state__v field. List available actions per state. Execute state transitions with validation.

title: [REFACTOR] Extract section ordering algorithm
description: Extract binder section ordering into SectionOrderManager. Implement gap-based ordering to minimize rebalancing. Support bulk reorder operations efficiently.

title: [REFACTOR] Add validation helpers for document metadata
description: Extract document metadata validation into reusable helpers. Create validators for document types, lifecycle states, required fields. Enable schema-driven validation from Vault configuration.

title: [GREEN] Implement entry actions execution
description: Implement entry action execution on state transitions. Support action types: start workflow, send notification, update fields, create records. Execute actions after criteria pass. Support skip on workflow cancel.

title: [REFACTOR] Consolidate document version increment logic
description: Extract version increment logic into DocumentVersionManager. Handle minor vs major version rules consistently. Support lifecycle-triggered major version bumps.

title: [REFACTOR] Consolidate soft delete patterns across entities
description: Extract soft delete pattern into DeleteManager. Apply consistent delete/restore logic for documents, binders, objects. Add retention policy hooks for hard delete scheduling.

title: [REFACTOR] Optimize document list pagination with cursor strategy
description: Refactor document list pagination to use cursor-based strategy. Replace offset pagination with keyset pagination for better performance. Cache cursor state for next_page efficiency.
